channel.title: Very loud, very deep, BOOM!
channel.description:
This is a really small explosive that makes a very big noise. Much easier to make than the last one and this one is also less dangerous. [b] I am still not held liable for your mishaps as a result of this thread![/b]
You will need:
Empty 2 liter bottle Tinfoil Cannon Fuse (refer to other post to learn how to make own fuse) Shot Gun Shells Scissors (again, sharp ones) Funnel (one can be made out of paper)
Take a piece of tinfoil about 5"x5" and put the middle on the tip of your thumb. Fold the outside edges down towards the bottom of your thumb. Take the lid off the bottle and stick your thumb down in there (if your thumb don't fit use another finger). Unpeel a little bit of the foil from your thumb onto the threads of the bottle. The foil should now hang down inside the bottle.
Cut up the shot gun shells like mentioned in the previous tutorial. Also, use the scissors to pierce a hole in the bottle cap ( a fuse will go through the hole.) Funnel the black powder from the shells into the foil. Fill the foil up about 3/4 full with powder.
Now screw the cap onto the bottle. (This can be tough with the foil on the threads, it will work though) slide the fuse down through the hole until it is submerged in the powder. Cut the fuse 1-2 inches from the cap. Light the bitch and get about 5 feet back. This looks really cool at night!
here's a visual aid for all of you people like me! [URL=http://img293.imageshack.us/my.php?image=visualaidfh5.jpg][IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/8773/visualaidfh5.th.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Very loud, very deep, BOOM!
item.dc:creator: @Slayerexpert Slayerexpert
item.description:
@Slayerexpert wrote:

White Castle:

It’s like a… shotgun blast. The very first time we did it the bottle swelled up really big, and we thought it’d just get bigger. Then a UPS truck ran over it.

Dude, UPS guys are the man! Some friends and I took leftover halloween pumpkins from this church, put them in the middle of the road, and nobody ran over them…except of course a UPS guy. Dang that was alot of pumpkin guts on that road…

Read full topic

item.title: Very loud, very deep, BOOM!
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Use a glass bottle if you really want to hurt them.

Read full topic

item.title: Very loud, very deep, BOOM!
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“White Castle, post:2, topic:9629”]This way is easier, and it’s < $2.00:

[ul][li]Buy dry ice at your local grocery store. (a pound is good, for about .99 cents)[/li]
[li]Fill a 2 liter bottle up with room temp water.[/li]
[li]Smash dry ice so you can put it in the opening of the bottle. Then put the dry ice in the bottle.[/li]
[li]Do the above very fast, and put the cap on TIGHTLY.[/li]
[li]Throw somewhere.[/li][/ul][/quote] Lol, I’ve heard of that one. My friend told me about it. He also told me aobut sometihng to do with a pringles can, I forgot how to make it happen. But ehres what happens:

  1. Lid flies off of pringles can
  2. The chips go up, up ,up and up
  3. The chips come down
  4. They all land right on top of each other, a few inches away from where they flew up. THEY DO NOT FALL DOWN! Thats what’s cool about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Very loud, very deep, BOOM!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

wait so whats louder the dry ice bomb or the shotgun one?

and aukake, in your sig are you reffering to “Only steers and queers come from texas private cowboy, And you don’t look much like a steer to me, so that kinda narrows it down.”
lol good movie…

Read full topic

item.title: Very loud, very deep, BOOM!
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

cykarr:

does it send shrapenl flying ??? cause i wouldnt want to try it if it does(piece of plastic bottle in eye = uncomfortable/unhappy)

no shrapnel what so ever. the explosion tears the tinfoil and happens inside the whole bottle and finally escapes through the weakest point (the top) and that’s about it. The cap might getcha but it won’t hurt and you’ll see it coming.

Read full topic

item.title: Very loud, very deep, BOOM!
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

I haven’t played with dry ice bombs in a while but these are cool at night because you set them in the street and they freak out cars, hardcore. The explosion all happens in the bottle, you’ll see a fire in the shape of a 2 liter if you back up a bit.

fire > ice

item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“White Castle, post:2, topic:9629”]This way is easier, and it’s < $2.00:

[ul][li]Buy dry ice at your local grocery store. (a pound is good, for about .99 cents)[/li]
[li]Fill a 2 liter bottle up with room temp water.[/li]
[li]Smash dry ice so you can put it in the opening of the bottle. Then put the dry ice in the bottle.[/li]
[li]Do the above very fast, and put the cap on TIGHTLY.[/li]
[li]Throw at someone.[/li][/ul][/quote]
Fixed :P.

I’ve done that before, it’s loud as hell.
